replies.msg:
見佢勾耳諗住可能戴得穩啲
咁耐唔出忍唔住早兩個月屌左隻大陸真藍芽
都唔錯，係我兩邊耳唔同大細一邊耳殻吸實晒另一邊有漏聲（之前戴開CM，初頭因為同樣問題拎左去refit所以好覺呢樣野）
不過都戴得穩跑步都唔會跌
我諗eoz應該都係差唔多情況
聲就不嬲兩邊都無乜期望

連線方面我估都係同一套方法：pair兩個device，單邊左還左右還右，雙耳就其中一邊couple去另一邊咁。做唔到AirPods咁seamless
係睇下佢話個耳勾做天線會唔會真係靠物理結構令佢收得好啲
So far生活入邊有幾個死位行過藍芽一定會窒既，iPhone SE換左X好左少少，睇下耳筒再換埋會唔會再好啲

replies.msg: 睇黎又delay

11個鐘前

Supplier is sending the goods produced everyday to the fulfillment company for fast processing.

This is highly unusual. The best practice for everyone is to wait that the full production is over to start shipping out.

But we arranged it that way so you guys (or at least some of you) start receiving the earphones and trust we were actually shipping.

We realize now it's a mistake since it creates more confusion and frustration than anything. We're getting more backlashes now than we ever did the past 6 months of delay. While shipping is actually the best thing that happened in the past 6 months!

Anyway, I digress. Mail is coming from the fulfillment company, called SFC.

Best,

12個鐘前

I wish we could pin a comment here!

I can confirm that most of the Noir & Gold and Noir Edition (silver tube & Black housing) single orders have been processed.

We might be looking at a 10% short-shipped for different reasons, that will be corrected next week (the fullfillment company is coming back to work on thursday).

As for the all-black, we're still a bit below the 4000pcs forecast by a small margin. We're waiting for the reports from both the supplier and the fullfillment company.

Please double check your spams folder and please don't worry, your order will be shipped if it hasn't already.

I know it can be frustrating but It's only a few more days of wait!

Posted by EOZ Audio (Creator)
For backers only

Dear Backers!

A lot of things have been said in the comments sections which we think we should address in an update.

First, let me confirm that over 7000 pcs of EOZ Air have been manufactured and have reached the fulfillment warehouse.

Now the fulfillment company hasn't been up to the ask.

1. They processed the orders using their own internal formatted .csv. Which wouldn't be a problem if we were shipping on a 2-3 days span. But as it's taking over 3 weeks, it ends up looking like a mess.

2. They seem to have been flagged as junk-mails on most servers...

We're not too happy about them but the task they had in hands wasn't too easy. Anyway, they re-open tomorrow and we expect a new roll-out of tracking numbers in the next 48 hours.

I would like to confirm that EVERY SINGLE BACKERS here will have been processed by October 15th-20th.

Production is running very smooth, workers are getting seriously skilled in the assembling of this special product and the QC agents know where to look and what to test.

We appreciate your patience, we're aware we have disappointed a bunch of you and we apologize for this, hoping the product you'll have delivered will make up for it to some extent.

Please believe me when I say that we've faced A Series of Unfortunate Events™ that delayed any deadline we've communicated before. So I would understand your skepticism.

But this time, this is it!

Thanks a lot for your understanding...

Ps: Please, if you have any issues, contact us via our website. The comment really section isn’t the best place to do so.

replies.msg: 係，要加$30 ，話住宅區要加，如公司寫字樓就唔使加，同埋太夜，聽日先慢慢試

暫時試左少少，睇Netflix, YouTube 基本上唔覺有延遲，有都係好微好微。聽歌音質方面我覺得只係合格，屬一般音質，高音位有些嘈雜，有啲分唔到樂器聲，因為我係用了耳膠來聽，可能用耳棉聲會好啲。

通話方面，在室內環境係清晰冇問題，對方聽得清楚，但搭地鐵時，一定要大聲講嘢，唔可以細聲，如果唔係，對方只會聽到好嘈的聲音。不過通話時係兩邊都有聲，而唔似只得單邊聲，呢個我幾滿意。

配帶方面係穩陣，跑步一定唔會跌，但可能設計唔太啱我耳型，我覺得有些頂頂地，唔太舒服，唔夠入，所以都聽到出面聲音。

總括都我覺得一般，感覺如價錢四、五百我會覺得合理啲，始終等左咁耐，都有些少失望。當然每個人對音質要求都唔同啦

comment有人問過
佢話係會退錢

用咗差唔多一個禮拜, 件嘢真係麻麻地。

音色 :
佢哋上一件產品 EOZ One 俾人話低音太重, 所以呢次會改善, 結果個低音都係好重, 中高音真係唔收貨, 之前用過 Muse 5 同 Crazy baby Nano, 呢隻 EOZ Air D聲真係濛濛地, 唔知同無 Aptx 有無關係。

接收 :
佢同電話連接幾穏定, 比之前兩隻都好, 但係左右耳連接就好奇怪, 有時係盒攞返出嚟, 兩邊會斷咗, 本 menu 又會教點 connect 番, 好在佢剛上有教, 尤其連盒差電後, 基本上左右耳一定斷, 呢個真係好差。
https://www.eozaudio.com/eozair/howto/

舒適度 :
呢料嘢比我想像中大粒, 掛耳勾雖然有彈性, 但係有少少夾耳仔, 不過每個人個 feel 都唔同, 我個人就一般啦。

如果 Ching 用 US$79 買係低, 用 US$99 買有D失望 。。。。。

本來想用 EOZ 懷念吓隻 B&O, 結果差太遠啦

replies.msg:
Dear Backers,

That has been a tough month. And a tough journey! We know that we have seriously eroded the patience of a good part of the community we've built here. Fortunately, for you as much as for us, it's getting to an end! For real this time, at least as far as shipping is concerned.

Regardless, and for one more time, I would like to reiterate our sincere apologies for anything that we have done incorrectly. We've said it many times, but at no points in time did we try to intentionally wrong you.

Anyway, let's stay practical. 95% of the backers here have been fulfilled. The 5 remaining percent are being handled manually. Also, the Navy Golds were the last one being produced and, therefore processed. So we expect a few non-working or updated tracking numbers on this batch.

All and all this will be fixed in the next few days. There's also a very small list of backers here, >1% , that are not on the list). We know the issue and we're solving it.

You can find the list of all tracking-numbers here:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/8trmbfe4dzo79p8/EOZ%20AIR%20SHIPPING%202210.pdf?dl=0

We've also added an URL where you can track the parcel on the service it's being redirected to. directly without going through SFC. Don't panic if you don't see any progress on a 24/48 hours basis. It's probably in transit and there's no much to say.

To find your tracking number, you need to use your Backerkit number. And research it through the document. Press simultaneously ctrl+F (for windows) and Command+F (for Mac) and type your reference number. You should find it. Just in case, you can access your backer kit account here: https://www.backerkit.com/master_backer_accounts/sign_in

Support: A new website is online. A FAQ/Support section with videos is being updated and will still be through the week.

You can contact us through the form if you have any issues. Obviously the current volume of tickets is very high (and difficult to handle/prioritise) as mostly regards the shipping/tracking numbers. Hopefully this will soon be behind us. And I hope I won't infuriate any of you if I ask you to please not contact us about your Tracking number unless you really feel you have an issue (importations/wrong address etc etc)

We know that some products will have some problems. Those are industry statistics we can't escape, and we've put some process in place to diagnose the source of the issue. We will help in any ways we can and we'll keep taking responsibilities for any products that would happen to be defectives.

DHL Hong Kong Shipping: We're preparing a special line of communication for your very special case. We'll email each one of you on tomorrow, Tuesday to solve it.

Again, we thank you for your support and we apologize for the delay.

Respectfully,

The EOZ Team
